name: Hotel Artemide
des: A stylish  4-star hotel located on Via Nazionale, known for its rooftop restaurant and modern rooms.

name: NH Collection Roma Fori Imperiali
des: A luxury 5-star hotel overlooking the Roman Forum, offering exceptional city views and premium service.

name: Hotel Barocco
des: A boutique hotel near Piazza Barberini with elegant rooms and a classic Roman atmosphere.

name: The Hive Hotel
des: A modern 4-star hotel close to Termini Station, featuring a spacious rooftop terrace and contemporary interiors.

name: Park Hotel Tokyo
des: A stylish 4-star hotel in Shiodome known for its art-themed rooms and panoramic views of Tokyo.

name: The Prince Park Tower Tokyo
des: A luxury 5-star hotel in Minato offering large rooms, fine dining, and views of Tokyo Tower.

name: Hotel Gracery Shinjuku
des: A modern hotel in Shinjuku famous for its Godzilla-themed decor and convenient access to nightlife.

name: Tokyu Stay Shibuya
des: A mid-range hotel in Shibuya featuring practical rooms with kitchenettes, ideal for longer stays.
